ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Sunday Services at 10.30am, Mon at 2.15pm (Home League, mainly for ladies), Tues at 9.15am (toddler group, up to 4 years), at 2pm (prayer meeting), at 3.45pm (Kids Club, 4-11 years), at 6pm Addiction to Christ, (addiction support group), Wed at 7am (Prayer Fellowship), at 2pm (over 60s group), at 7.30pm (Bible Fellowship, fortnightly), Thurs at 10.30am (Carers support group, monthly), at 8pm (choir/band practice), Fri at 9.15am (coffee morning)
